title: TikFinity | TikTok LIVE Tools
text: TikFinity is the most popular streaming tool for TikTok LIVE. Pimp your live stream with interactive widgets for TikTok LIVE! Automatically play sound alerts when you receive gifts or include professional overlays in Live Studio. We offer countless possibilities for interactive TikTok streams for free! You can maximize your audience and improve your viewers' engagement with little effort. TikFinity offers you a wide range of free interactive features for your Live Stream on TikTok. From our most popular features such as Text-to-Speech (TTS) and Sound Alerts up to IFTTT integrations for Smart Devices. We have something for everyone! Join us and transform your TikTok LIVE into a dynamic and immersive adventure! Especially popular are our game integrations for Minecraft and GTA 5. Viewers can control the games by sending gifts and spawning NPCs in the game. By letting viewers control your stream, you can increase your TikTok LIVE revenue because viewers love to interact with the stream! Our tool is comparable to Streamlabs and perfectly optimized for TikTok LIVE. You can implement our features in TikTok LIVE Studio, OBS Studio, Streamlabs OBS, and other streaming software. Our Tools for TikTok LIVE are free to use and easy to set up. TikFinity was created by Zerody and is now developed and maintained by a dedicated team. We are not affiliated with TikTok. Our mission is to make TikTok streaming more interactive, fun, and engaging for creators and viewers. Follow us on Mastodon
